abstract: Edgar M Villchur, innovator of relatively small hi-fi speakers, dies at age 94.
snippet: Mr. Villchur invented the AR-1 loudspeaker, which produced high-fidelity bass tones and was a quarter of the size of the speakers on the market.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Villchur invented the AR-1 loudspeaker, which produced high-fidelity bass tones and was a quarter of the size of the speakers on the market.

headline.main: Edgar M. Villchur, a Hi-Fi Innovator, Is Dead at 94
headline.print_headline: Edgar M. Villchur, a Hi-Fi Innovator, Is Dead at 94
headline.seo: Edgar M. Villchur, Hi-Fi Innovator, Dies at 94
